companyInfo.Competitors: Square 1 Bank, First Republic Bank, Comerica

jobDescription: Sales Enablement aims to identify and resolve sales pain points by developing or deploying solutions that will help the sales teams be more effective, efficient, and productive. Primary Responsibilities:Assist with the creation of neural maps through research and analysis of SVB target markets, prospects, and influencers.Collaborate with business and IT counterparts to streamline data import, processing, cleanup, and maintenance.Help project owners with management and coordination of upcoming product deployments, training, and logistics.Identify opportunities for quick wins through product development or process optimization.Candidates must be students currently enrolled in a college/university (Minimum Requirement)Candidate should have a minimum GPA of 3.0Seeking the following Majors: Engineering, Science, Math, or Finance (or open to all majors)Seeking Undergrad level students (or open to a both)Preferred candidates should have work or academic experience with the following: knowledge of tech and venture ecosystem; experience working at startupsSDL2017
